name: Butterfly Effect (Aviv871 Games)
description:
Butterfly Effect is a minimal yet challenging game of falling dominoes.

Featuring:
  ●  Simple beautiful graphics
  ●  Easy to play yet challenging
  ●  4 levels with different difficulties and surprises
  ●  Procedurally generated world
  ●  Compete on the first place of the leaderboard with your Facebook friends, in each level!
  ●  Achieve upgrades to use during the game
  ●  Cloud game progress backup
  ●  Falling bricks
  ●  A butterfly (..effect)
  ●  References to stuff
